content.question: The graph of the piecewise linear function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, which has a domain of <math alttext="negative 2 is less than or equal to x, is less than or equal to 3 " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown in the figure above. What is the value of <math alttext="the integral from, negative 2 to 3, of, f of x, d x " overflow="scroll"><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
